metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28190 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where improperinput validation can cause denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
